name: @examples/different-transcribers
description: Examples of testing IVR call flow using various transcribers

scripts.test-ivr:google-speech-to-text: export LOCAL_SERVER_PORT=8080 && export PUBLIC_SERVER_URL=$(curl -s localhost:4040/api/tunnels | jq -r .tunnels[0].public_url) && node --require ts-node/register src/google-speech-to-text.ts
scripts.test-ivr:amazon-transcribe: export LOCAL_SERVER_PORT=8080 && export PUBLIC_SERVER_URL=$(curl -s localhost:4040/api/tunnels | jq -r .tunnels[0].public_url) && node --require ts-node/register src/amazon-transcribe.ts
scripts.record:render: rm -f terminal-recording.gif && terminalizer render -o terminal-recording terminal-recording
